name: Do 11
description:
Unique Do11 Process

DO11 is a 2D first-person puzzle + visual novel game. You have to choose options and solve puzzles through the smartphone screen to solve the story. Also, as the story approaches its climax, a worthy directing awaits you.

Interesting Worldview and story

Currently, in the real world, a deadly and highly contagious plague has spread and all of humanity has fled to the cyber world. However, due to the many flaws and deficiencies in the technology, a serious error has occurred in the entire cyber world, and it is the worst state where even pleasure killers are jumping on the edge of this chaotic situation.

In such a gloomy situation, the protagonist, who is just an ordinary person, accidentally gets recommended and installed the DO11 app. In DO11, the normal days of delivering the developer's mission start to become more and more brutal for a while... What choice will you make to overcome these difficulties? And is the ending waiting for you really a happy ending?

Various Options and Endings

As you progress through the game, you will come across several options, and depending on your choices, the progress of the game may change significantly. DO11 also has multiple endings, each containing fragments of the truth of the world.

Three-dimensional Character

In DO11, Seong-ah, Mingyu, and Bin are the main characters. As they progress through the story, the way they treat the protagonist changes depending on the choices you make and the success of the puzzle, and you may gain or lose hope in life. In addition, the characters' sad past and reversals are waiting for you.
